text: I think I asked about this a while back, but its a little tricky to dev email templates when the feature to create email templates is blocked in unpaid sandbox accounts
any help on unblocking this would be greatly appreciated
I swear there is a dev sandbox for this
Someone predating those two gave me the correct link once
<@UD53A9UUR> so its different than the sandbox dev portal you get when using the new local dev tooling?
Not sure, but the first dev account I had had a ton of restrictions, the next one was the full cms
Its so strange because logic would seem that to develop custom modules, these would not only be for webpages, but also for email templates...
I can create custom coded templates, but what tema really needs is the ability to take modules I build and then construct the templates.
